alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:59AM PST until March 05 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Storm total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...South east Lake County, including highway 395 south of Lakeview, and highway 140 east of Lakeview. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow covered roads. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow could cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
